Posts.EditableText: Yeah minimalism is not for me :D

Looks like I've abandoned this thread (and my site) a little bit. I actually have plans for EV Range Calculator, though.

Maybe I'll divide online and downloadable programs within the main page. Or a seperate page for my current game Street RPG, including a download link... Or how about a seperate page for EVERY PROGRAM/GAME I make? That way people would get more infos about them. 

Or what could be better for it?

Posts.EditableText:
**VERSION 2.0**

I decided to change the interface to something like a Pentium 4 BIOS.

Software array is unchanged though. It has a shutdown program, a console clock application, an IDE demo that allows you to write .BAT files, an electric vehicle calculator, as well as a link to my game Street RPG. Nothing more, nothing less :D

I think it looks much better and more advanced than previous version, though.

Posts.EditableText:
**MIDTOWN MADNESS SUBWEBSITE**

I'm working on a section about Midtown Madness franchise, which is my all-time favourite video game franchise. This (sub)site is the best website project I've ever worked on. It currently has information of all five games (incl. two obscure mobile versions that were released in 2004), some screenshots, downloads and mods. This site originated because I originally wanted to partake in redesign of a community website called "MMArchive", but the e-mail I sent was still not answered so I decided to do my thing.

I'll ultimately add it to my website, but I don't know if I'll finish it this week. Like 90 percent of the content is complete (for the present version), but I have something more planned for it.
